about_the_game:
The Atlas Problem is a first person tower defense / base-builder game where the player assumes the role of an employee of the Atlas lunar mining operation.


Blast asteroids, collect resources, unlock new skills and tougher challenges - all while you try to learn more about the true nature of your circumstances.


Do it for Atlas.


___________________________


The Atlas Problem is in very active development, and we are working closely with our tester group to make changes and improvements on a regular basis. Please join our Discord if you'd like to get involved as a tester!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Six-Core Xeon E5-2643 @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
